login.authenticationRequired: You need to login to see this page
login.invalidToken: Your token is invalid. You have been logged out
login.logoutSuccess: You have been logged out successfully

parliamentManagement.noActiveSessionTooltip: In order to set an active session go to sessions list and press the purple dot next to the session you want to make active
parliamentManagement.name: Name
parliamentManagement.userFileTooltip:
File with voters data, uploaded before the start of a parliament.

Description: Name, Surname, Index_number, Has_vote(yes/no), Mandate_number
parliamentManagement.changeToActiveSession: Click this to set session as active
parliamentManagement.activeSessionDescription: Active session is a session that you are currently working on. The home page and members tabs will be displayed in a context of active session
parliamentManagement.noSessionsDisclaimer:
Currently there are no sessions.
Create one using 'New session' button at the top of the page.

FINISHED_NOT_SAVED_TO_GLOBAL.name: Finished, not saved to global
FINISHED_NOT_SAVED_TO_GLOBAL.description: Finished parliament (after votings), waiting for data to be saved to the global database.

FINISHED.name: Finished
FINISHED.description: Finished parliament (after voting), data saved to the global database

SUSPENDED.name: Suspended
SUSPENDED.description: Suspended parliament, not all of the votings were voted, waiting to be resumed

IN_PROGRESS.name: In progress
IN_PROGRESS.description: Ongoing parliament, start of the voting is possible

BEFORE_VOTING.name: In preparations, ready to start
BEFORE_VOTING.description: Started parliament with detailed information completed (parliament data, voters list), waiting for election committee to be given

IN_PREPARATION.name: In preparations
IN_PREPARATION.description: Parliament ready to be started. One can edit the parliament data, generate passwords, remove or start the parliament

sessionActions.areYouSureToRemove: Are you sure you want to remove session: {sessionName}

session.committeeAtLeastMembers: The committee should have at least {amount} members

voting.name: Name
voting.thresholdMustBe: Threshold must be between {from} to {to} (number of options)
voting.specifyOptions: Specify options to make use of threshold
voting.noVotings: There are no votings in a given group
voting.thresholdTooltip: Threshold is used for multiple choice votings. It says how many options can maximaly be voted through.
voting.cardinalityTooltip:
Cardinality allows to pick the number of options (variants) included in a single voting.


Single choice voting is a standard voting with the possibility to vote for, against or hold.

Multiple choice voting allows to give some options under one voting. Each option can be voted for, against or hold. Example usecase for multiple choice voting would be a voting to choose members for some committee, each option would be a single candidate.

preparation.dataIncomplete: The data you have provided is incomplete. Make sure that all the fields in provided file are filled.
preparation.invalidFormat: The suplied file is in a wrong format. Make sure that the file you provided has all the necessary columns and has a valid extension - csv.
preparation.noUserFileLoaded: In order to generate passwords the user file must be loaded.
preparation.noSession: The session you are trying to edit doesn't exist.

votings.noVoting: The voting you are trying to modify doesn't exist.
votings.votingNotStarted: You can only modify/start votings that are not started yet.
votings.anotherStartedVoting: Only one voting may be held at a time. Stop the other voting to start a new one.
votings.notDuringVoting: You can only stop a voting that is currently held.
votings.notFinished: You can only get a report from a voting that is finished.

parliamentManagement.notInProgress: You can only finish/suspend a parliament that is in progress.
parliamentManagement.notInPreparation: You can only start a parliament that is in preparations.
parliamentManagement.notBeforeVoting: You can only start a parliament that is in a 'before voting' status.
parliamentManagement.alreadyOneInProgress: You cannot start a parliament - only one parliament can be in progress at a time.
parliamentManagement.notSuspended: You can only resume a parliament that is suspended.
parliamentManagement.notFinished: You can only delete a parliament that is finished and archived to global database
parliamentManagement.fileValidation: The file you provided is in a wrong format.
